// Sign of volume difference of the two tets
// res = vol<p, q, r, s> - vol<p+d, q, r, s>

px py pz dx dy dz qx qy qz rx ry rz sx sy sz

qx_px = qx - px
qy_py = qy - py
rx_px = rx - px
ry_py = ry - py
rz_pz = rz - pz
qz_pz = qz - pz
sx_px = sx - px
sy_py = sy - py
sz_pz = sz - pz

tmp_a = qx_px * ry_py
tmp_b = qy_py * rx_px
m01 = tmp_a - tmp_b
tmq_a = qx_px * rz_pz
tmq_b = qz_pz * rx_px
m02 = tmq_a - tmq_b
tmr_a = qy_py * rz_pz
tmr_b = qz_pz * ry_py
m12 = tmr_a - tmr_b
mt1 = m01 * sz_pz
mt2 = m02 * sy_py
mt3 = m12 * sx_px
mtt = mt1 - mt2
m012 = mtt + mt3

qx_px1 = qx_px - dx
qy_py1 = qy_py - dy
rx_px1 = rx_px - dx
ry_py1 = ry_py - dy
rz_pz1 = rz_pz - dz
qz_pz1 = qz_pz - dz
sx_px1 = sx_px - dx
sy_py1 = sy_py - dy
sz_pz1 = sz_pz - dz

tmp_a1 = qx_px1 * ry_py1
tmp_b1 = qy_py1 * rx_px1
m011 = tmp_a1 - tmp_b1
tmq_a1 = qx_px1 * rz_pz1
tmq_b1 = qz_pz1 * rx_px1
m021 = tmq_a1 - tmq_b1
tmr_a1 = qy_py1 * rz_pz1
tmr_b1 = qz_pz1 * ry_py1
m121 = tmr_a1 - tmr_b1
mt11 = m011 * sz_pz1
mt21 = m021 * sy_py1
mt31 = m121 * sx_px1
mtt1 = mt11 - mt21
m0121 = mtt1 + mt31

res = m012 - m0121
